question: 1. Which of these best describes a graph?

answers.a: A linear data structure with finite nodes and edges
answers.b: A non-linear data structure consisting of nodes and edges
answers.c: A data structure which has infinite nodes and edges

question: 2. How many number of edges need to be present in a complete graph having n vertices?
3. What does it mean when we say that an algorithm X is asymptotically more efficient than Y?

answers.a: X will always be a better choice for small inputs
answers.b: X will always be a better choice for large inputs
answers.c: Y will always be a better choice for small inputs
answers.d: X will always be a better choice for all inputs

question:
4. int i, j, k = 0;
for (i = n / 2; i <= n; i++){
for (j = 2; j <= n; j = j * 2){
k = k + n / 2; }
}
What is the time complexity for the above code?

answers.b: O(N + M) time, O(N + M) space
answers.d: O(N * M) time, O(N + M) space
